name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.4.2
body:
**NOTICE: Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.**

---

Changes since **[V3.0.4.1](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.4.1)**:

- ASF OS-specific packages are now link-time optimized with **[monolinker](https://github.com/mono/linker)**, which removes unnecessary .NET Core runtime dependencies and results in smaller overall size.
- Usual amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/payment_request?address=1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.4.1
body:
Changes since **[V3.0.3.0](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.3.0)**:

- Removed `CardDropsRestricted` and added `HoursUntilCardDrops` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** with default value of `3` in its place [1].
- ASF is now available as official **[Docker](https://hub.docker.com/r/justarchi/archisteamfarm)** container, check **[wiki](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Docker)** for more info (ref: #661, #670).
- Added `Changelog.html` and `ConfigGenerator.html` helper links to the ASF folder.
- Added `!ib`, `!ibadd` and `!ibrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Heavily improved redeeming function that now will take in account `RateLimited` bots and won't attempt to forward/distribute keys to them anymore, saving time and failing requests.
- Slightly improved code responsible for ensuring that `SteamLogin` and `SteamPassword` fields are valid.
- Slightly improved code responsible for accepting trades sent from `SendOnFarmingFinished` + `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished` bots.
- `!update` command will now properly state success and failure.
- Fixed quite important regression introduced in V3.0.2.4 that could make ASF trying to redeem given key infinitely when there are no more bots to try.
- Fixed `!resume` not working for users with `Operator` `SteamUserPermissions`.
- Fixed priority idling queue not always working properly.
- Fixed ASF auto-update feature not working when custom `--path` was specified.
- Usual amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1]
> It's important to note that in the past `HoursUntilCardDrops` was only `0` or `2`, and this is why ASF had a single `CardDropsRestricted` property that allowed to switch between those two values. With recent changes we noticed that not only majority of users require `3` hours in place of previous `2` now, but also that `HoursUntilCardDrops` is now dynamic and can hit any value on per-account basis.

If you're interested in more info, we encourage to visit **[performance](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Performance)** section. Rationale can be found on **[SG](https://www.steamgifts.com/go/comment/mq8pgEf)**.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/payment_request?address=1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.4.0
body:
**NOTICE: This is stable release candidate.**

---

Changes since **[V3.0.3.0](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.3.0)**:

- Removed `CardDropsRestricted` and added `HoursUntilCardDrops` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** with default value of `3` in its place [1].
- ASF is now available as official **[Docker](https://hub.docker.com/r/justarchi/archisteamfarm)** container, check **[wiki](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Docker)** for more info (ref: #661, #670).
- Added `Changelog.html` and `ConfigGenerator.html` helper links to the ASF folder.
- Added `!ib`, `!ibadd` and `!ibrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Heavily improved redeeming function that now will take in account `RateLimited` bots and won't attempt to forward/distribute keys to them anymore, saving time and failing requests.
- Slightly improved code responsible for ensuring that `SteamLogin` and `SteamPassword` fields are valid.
- Slightly improved code responsible for accepting trades sent from `SendOnFarmingFinished` + `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished` bots.
- `!update` command will now properly state success and failure.
- Fixed quite important regression introduced in V3.0.2.4 that could make ASF trying to redeem given key infinitely when there are no more bots to try.
- Fixed `!resume` not working for users with `Operator` `SteamUserPermissions`.
- Fixed priority idling queue not always working properly.
- Fixed ASF auto-update feature not working when custom `--path` was specified.
- Usual amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1]
> It's important to note that in the past `HoursUntilCardDrops` was only `0` or `2`, and this is why ASF had a single `CardDropsRestricted` property that allowed to switch between those two values. With recent changes we noticed that not only majority of users require `3` hours in place of previous `2` now, but also that `HoursUntilCardDrops` is now dynamic and can hit any value on per-account basis.

If you're interested in more info, we encourage to visit **[performance](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Performance)** section. Rationale can be found on **[SG](https://www.steamgifts.com/go/comment/mq8pgEf)**.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.3.0
body:
Changes since **[V3.0.2.8](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.2.8)**:

- [!] Fixed wrong `SteamTradeMatcher` dupes logic (ref: #657) [1].
- ASF Windows variant now includes (once again) proper icon. Other variants might make use of `ArchiSteamFarm.ico` that is now added to the release.
- Patched up `WebSocket` `SteamProtocols` option not working correctly on Windows 7 SP1.
- IPC will now follow standard alphabetical bot sorting order when used without target bot instance.
- Usual amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

[1] A potential attacker could force ASF into accepting a non-neutral+ (bad) trade by exploiting wrongly coded dupes logic condition, as explained in #657. Therefore, all older ASF versions (including V2) are considered **insecure** and it's strongly recommended to update if you're making use of `SteamTradeMatcher` feature.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.2.8
body:
Changes since **[V3.0.2.7](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.2.7)**:

- Extra out-of-range **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** arguments are now joined into the last one. 
- ASF `Trace` **[logging](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Logging)** will now also log echo messages (ref: #653).

---

[1] As stated on the wiki:
> ASF will "join" extra out-of-range arguments to plural type of the last in-range argument. This means that `!redeem bot key1 key2 key3` for `!redeem <Bots> <Keys>` will work exactly the same as `!redeem bot key1,key2,key3`. Together with accepting newline as command delimiter, this makes it possible for you to write `!redeem bot` then paste a list of keys separated by any acceptable delimiter character (such as newline), or standard `,` ASF delimiter.

This makes it possible not only to use other args delimiter, such as the newline, but also map out-of-range arguments into the last one, making the following behaviour possible:

![Image](https://i.imgur.com/FEPTt3h.png)**

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.2.7
body:
Changes since **[V3.0.1.9](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.1.9)**:

- Added helper launcher scripts for generic ASF variant.
- Heavily improved function responsible for fetching bot's inventory by rewriting it to use new API endpoint (ref: #646).
- Slightly improved code responsible for detecting ASF configuration changes (ref: #639).
- Trades from blacklisted users will now always be rejected, regardless of `IsBotAccount` property.
- Fixed `Timeout` redeem status not populating unused keys correctly. (ref: #642).
- Fixed possible ASF crash that could happen when being unable to decrypt both password and login key.
- Fixed `!leave` command missing `<Bots>` syntax.
- Removed obsolete and undocumented ASF V0 command-less method of redeeming keys.
- Usual amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

**Notice for Linux/OS X users:** Old ASF might crash with `'Mono.Unix.Native.Stdlib' threw an exception` during updating to this version. This is one-time issue that is already fixed in new ASF code, simply `chmod +x ArchiSteamFarm` after crash and launch as usual, you'll already have latest version. Sorry for the inconvenience.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.2.1
body:
### **NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V3.0.1.9](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.1.9)**:

- Greatly optimized ASF OS-specific packages size by removing unused code parts, thanks to **[.NET IL Linker](https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/30)**.
- Trades from blacklisted users will now always be rejected, regardless of `IsBotAccount` property.
- Changed default value of `SteamProtocols` from `1` to `4` (ref: #612)
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.1.9
body:
Changes since **[V3.0.1.8](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/3.0.1.8)**:

- Fixed a small regression introduced in 3.0.1.8 that could cause infinite relogin if `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` was enabled (ref: #623)
- Fixed ASF not always (re)starting farming after getting disconnected.
- Decreased default ASF memory usage by re-enabling old workstation GC, visit **[high-performance setup](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/High-performance-setup)** if you'd like to keep using server GC.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

body:

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.1.6
body:
Changes since **[V2.3.2.0](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.2.0)**:

- [!] ASF now runs on .NET Core, see **[V3 migration](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/V3-Migration)**. You might be also interested in updated wiki sections, such as **[compatibility](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Compatibility)**.
- Added support for automatic Steam discovery queue, `AutoDiscoveryQueue`  **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #580).
- Removed `!redeem^` and `!redeem&` commands. Re-added `!redeem^` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** that requires redeeming mode now (ref: #542).
- Removed `WCFHost`, `WCFPort` and `WCFBinding` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `BackgroundGCPeriod`, `IPCHost` and `IPCPort` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `MatchableTypes` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `IdleRefundableGames` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #522).
- Added `Random`, `RedeemDateTimesAscending` and `RedeemDateTimesDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `BadgeLevelsAscending` and `BadgeLevelsDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #510).
- Added Double Fine Adventure (`402590`) to global blacklist.
- Added `!iq`, `!iqadd` and `!iqrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #545).
- Added `!pause&` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #509).
- Added `!unpack` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #537)
- Added `!transfer` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #609)
- Fixed ASF not aborting farming in `Complex` mode when getting disconnected from Steam network.
- Fixed ASF sending multiple trades instead of one when multiple events arrive (ref: #583).
- Fixed ASF attempting to initialize ASF 2FA time without network connectivity (ref: #598).
- Greatly improved ASF logic as in when to check badge pages (no more useless checks after games switching)
- Increased default value of `IdleFarmingPeriod` **[global configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** from `3` to `8`.
- `GiftsLimiterDelay` will now also apply to `!redeem`, `!owns` and `!addlicense` requests (ref: #577).
- `Forwarding` `RedeemingPreferences` will now also respect `SteamUserPermissions`.
- ASF will now automatically include your trading token and `MatchableTypes` if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- `!owns` command will now also state extra owned bots count (ref: #564).
- Gigantic amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/payment_request?address=1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

- Added `BadgeLevelsAscending` and `BadgeLevelsDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #510).
- Added Double Fine Adventure (`402590`) to global blacklist.
- Added `!iq`, `!iqadd` and `!iqrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #545).
- Added `!pause&` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #509).

- Fixed ASF not aborting farming in `Complex` mode when getting disconnected from Steam network.
- Fixed ASF sending multiple trades instead of one when multiple events arrive (ref: #583).
- Fixed ASF attempting to initialize ASF 2FA time without network connectivity (ref: #598).
- Greatly improved ASF logic as in when to check badge pages (no more useless checks after games switching)
- Increased default value of `IdleFarmingPeriod` **[global configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** from `3` to `8`.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

- `GiftsLimiterDelay` will now also apply to `!redeem` and `!addlicense` requests (ref: #577).
- `Forwarding` `RedeemingPreferences` will now also respect `SteamUserPermissions`.
- ASF will now automatically include your trading token and `MatchableTypes` if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- `!owns` command will now also state extra owned bots count (ref: #564).
- Gigantic amount of code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

- Added `Random`, `RedeemDateTimesAscending` and `RedeemDateTimesDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `BadgeLevelsAscending` and `BadgeLevelsDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #510).
- Added Double Fine Adventure (`402590`) to global blacklist.
- Added `!iq`, `!iqadd` and `!iqrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #545).
- Added `!pause` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #509).
- Added `!unpack` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #537)
- Fixed ASF not aborting farming in `Complex` mode when getting disconnected from Steam network.
- Fixed ASF sending multiple trades instead of one when multiple events arrive (ref: #583).
- Fixed ASF attempting to initialize ASF 2FA time without network connectivity (ref: #598).
- `GiftsLimiterDelay` will now also apply to `!redeem` and `!addlicense` requests (ref: #577).
- `Forwarding` `RedeemingPreferences` will now also respect `SteamUserPermissions`.
- ASF will now automatically include your trading token and `MatchableTypes` if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- `!owns` command will now also state extra owned bots count (ref: #564).
- Gigantic code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/payment_request?address=1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.0.6
body:
### **NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V2.3.2.0](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.2.0)**:

- [!] ASF now runs on .NET Core, see **[V3 migration](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/V3-Migration)**.
- [!] Added support for automatic Steam discovery queue, `AutoDiscoveryQueue`  **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #580).
- Removed `!redeem^` and `!redeem&` commands. Re-added `!redeem^` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** that requires redeeming mode now (ref: #542).
- Removed `WCFHost`, `WCFPort` and `WCFBinding` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `IPCHost` and `IPCPort` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `MatchableTypes` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `IdleRefundableGames` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #522).
- Added `Random`, `RedeemDateTimesAscending` and `RedeemDateTimesDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `BadgeLevelsAscending` and `BadgeLevelsDescending` to `FarmingOrder` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #510).
- Added Double Fine Adventure (`402590`) to global blacklist.
- Added `!iq`, `!iqadd` and `!iqrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #545).
- Added `!pause` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #509).
- Added `!unpack` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #537)
- Fixed ASF not aborting farming in `Complex` mode when getting disconnected from Steam network.
- Fixed ASF sending multiple trades instead of one when multiple events arrive (ref: #583).
- Fixed ASF attempting to initialize ASF 2FA time without network connectivity (ref: #598).
- `GiftsLimiterDelay` will now also apply to `!redeem` and `!addlicense` requests (ref: #577).
- `Forwarding` `RedeemingPreferences` will now also respect `SteamUserPermissions`.
- ASF will now automatically include your trading token and `MatchableTypes` if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- `!owns` command will now also state extra owned bots count (ref: #564).
- Gigantic code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/payment_request?address=1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V3.0.0.5
body:
**NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V2.3.2.0](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.2.0)**:

- [!] ASF now runs on .NET Core, see **[V3 migration](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/V3-Migration)**.
- [!] Added support for automatic Steam discovery queue [1].
- Removed `WCFHost`, `WCFPort` and `WCFBinding` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `IPCHost` and `IPCPort` **[global configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `MatchableTypes` **[bot configuration property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added `Random` `FarmingOrder` to **[bot configuration properties](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Added Double Fine Adventure (`402590`) to global blacklist.
- Fixed ASF not aborting farming in `Complex` mode when getting disconnected from Steam network.
- Fixed ASF sending multiple trades instead of one when multiple events arrive (ref: #583).
- `GiftsLimiterDelay` will now also apply to `!redeem` and `!addlicense` requests (ref: #577).
- `Forwarding` `RedeemingPreferences` will now also respect `SteamUserPermissions`.
- ASF will now automatically include your trading token and `MatchableTypes` if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

[1] ASF will now automatically check each 6 hours if given account can obtain cards through clearing discovery queue. If yes, ASF will automatically do that on as-needed basis. The code should also work for future sales, assuming Valve won't change any core implementation.

Entire thing is done automatically, in load-balanced way across all `Enabled` accounts. First bot will check its discovery queue in around 1 minute since program launch. Like with logging in or sending trades, whether asking/clearing discovery queue actually succeeds or not is out of the ASF concern.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

- ASF will now automatically include your trading token if you participate in our **[public listing](http://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

[1] ASF will now automatically check each 6 hours if given account can obtain cards through clearing discovery queue. If yes, ASF will automatically do that on as-needed basis. The code should also work for future sales, assuming Valve won't change any core implementation.

Entire thing is done automatically, in load-balanced way across all `Enabled` accounts. First bot will check its discovery queue in around 1 minute since program launch. Like with logging in or sending trades, whether asking/clearing discovery queue actually succeeds or not is out of the ASF concern.

Huge thanks to all my **[patrons](http://patreon.com/JustArchi)** that made this release possible.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.3.1.8
body:
Changes since **[V2.3.1.4](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.1.4)**:

- ASF will now follow common *nix convention and ignore config files starting with a dot (ref: #554).
- ASF will now respect permissions when distributing/forwarding keys and won't send keys to bots that given user doesn't have access to.
- ASF will now try to avoid using `HandleOfflineMessages` if it can be sure that there is no offline message from any user permitted to use ASF commands, potentially making it possible to use for primary accounts.
- `!pause` command will now properly deactivate also `GamesPlayedWhileIdle`.
- Improved `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished` that previously didn't work properly with `0` `IdleFarmingPeriod` (ref: #557).
- Improved Steam message splitting logic that should now always arrive in proper order when Bot is forced to split the message because of its size.
- Fixed ASF attempting to start broken (config/database) bots.
- Further fixed WCF maximum message length (ref: #484).
- Usual code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

[![Patreon support](https://img.shields.io/badge/Patreon-support-yellow.svg)](https://www.patreon.com/JustArchi) [![Paypal.me donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

body:
Changes since **[V2.3.1.2](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.1.2)**:
- Fixed a small regression introduced in version 2.3.0.9 that could cause `!redeem` failures to be always displayed as `Fail`.
- Improved `!redeem` statuses by adding extra internal Steam network result on top of existing purchase result. `OK/NoDetail` looks much better than `NoDetail` alone 🙂.

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.3.1.2
body:
Changes since **[V2.3.0.5](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.3.0.5)**:
- [!] ASF now requires Mono in version 4.8 or higher (Linux / OS X, ref: #529).
- Added `!bl`, `!bladd` and `!blrm` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #515).
- `!owns` and `!nickname` **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** in *given bots* versions can now make use of space character in query string.
- Fixed `!pause` command not working when user had "only" `Owner` permission (ref: #512).
- Fixed Steam wallet code redeem error that resulted in `Timeout` instead of resulting in proper error status.
- Fixed potential STM logic exploit that could result in accepting non-neutral+ trades (ref: https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/4e1a03222bfc296c099ff428566a73071335e0ae).
- Lowered required permission for accepting a friend invite, from `Operator` to `FamilySharing`.
- Improved compatibility of configs auto-reload with text editors that delete a file prior to writing to it (ref: #520).
- Improved concurrent inventory calls (ref: https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/8c0a100ae80737aa724b4efe52f04205f4fb18ec).
- Highly optimized function responsible for getting trade offers (ref: https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/a6c448340d16a96d1d092005322eb125c3fa749e).
- Improved translation of various `TimeSpan` parts in many languages, which now is translated dynamically based on culture and resulting number.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.3.0.5
body:
Changes since **[V2.2.3.7](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.3.7)**:
- [!] Reworked permissions, this is a breaking change [1].
- [!] Changed behaviour of `!api` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**, this is a breaking change [2].
- Added `!api <Bots>` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #485).
- Added `!nickname` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Added extra workaround for invalidating old trades [3].
- Fixed ASF compilation on OS X, also added OS X as a test platform to our **[Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm)**.
- Fixed ASF being able to trigger a rare Steam glitch that could lead to change of bot's nickname to `[unassigned]` when `FarmOffline` is set to `false`.
- Fixed recent Steam breaking change introduced by Valve that broke discovering of keys being redeemed in all ASF versions prior to 2.3.0.4 (ref: #508).
- ASF release is now compiled with latest Visual Studio 2017 by our **[AppVeyor CI](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/JustArchi/archisteamfarm)** (previously: VS15) [4].
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1] This was done due to the fact of adding new operator permission in PR #500 - initially it was limited to a single person, like `SteamMasterID`. Due to the fact that it could make sense to promote multiple operators for a single bot instance, it was a good idea to rewrite it in a way that would allow to specify multiple people instead of just a single account. And due to the fact that I had to create another collection anyway, it no longer made sense to separate "masters" from "operators", so I unified permissions in a single property which is now called `SteamUserPermissions` and allows to declare any number of people with any permission set. This means that you'll need to re-generate your configs, as old `SteamMasterID` is ☠️ . Please read explanation of `SteamUserPermissions` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** for further details.

[2] Due to the fact that `!api <Bots>` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** now exists, it didn't make sense to keep old `!api` command that works the same as new `!api ASF`. For consistency, old `!api` command now affects only current bot instance, same like all other commands, and old behaviour of `!api` can now be achieved with `!api ASF`.

[3] For some reason it's entirely possible that invalid (no longer available/possible) trades are filling up our trading queue and not allowing us to make any new trades before manually opening "trades sent" page once and trying again. ASF now automatically does that before sending a trade. Please note that it has nothing to do with valid (available/possible) trades being in "ready to accept" or "awaiting confirmation" state.

[4] Newer compiler might generate better code than the old one, leading to small performance/memory benefits.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

body:
**NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V2.2.3.7](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.3.7)**:
- [!] Reworked permissions, this is a breaking change [1].
- [!] Changed behaviour of `!api` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**, this is a breaking change [2].
- Added `!api <Bots>` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #485).
- Added `!nickname` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Added extra workaround for invalidating old trades [3].
- Fixed ASF compilation on OS X, also added OS X as a test platform to our **[Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm)**.
- Fixed ASF being able to trigger rare Steam glitch that could lead to change of bot's nickname to `[unassigned]` when `FarmOffline` is set to `false`.
- ASF release is now compiled with latest Visual Studio 2017 by our **[AppVeyor CI](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/JustArchi/archisteamfarm)** (previously: VS15) [4].
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1] This was done due to the fact of adding new operator permission in PR #500 - initially it was limited to a single person, like `SteamMasterID`. Due to the fact that it could make sense to promote multiple operators for a single bot instance, it was a good idea to rewrite it in a way that would allow to specify multiple people instead of just a single account. And due to the fact that I had to create another collection anyway, it no longer made sense to separate "masters" from "operators", so I unified permissions in a single property which is now called `SteamUserPermissions` and allows to declare any number of people with any permission set. This means that you'll need to re-generate your configs, as old `SteamMasterID` is ☠️ . Please read explanation of `SteamUserPermissions` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** for further details.

[2] Due to the fact that `!api <Bots>` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** now exists, it didn't make sense to keep old `!api` command that works the same as new `!api ASF`. For consistency, old `!api` command now affects only current bot instance, same like all other commands, and old behaviour of `!api` can now be achieved with `!api ASF`.

[3] For some reason it's entirely possible that invalid (no longer available/possible) trades are filling up our trading queue and not allowing us to make any new trades before manually opening "trades sent" page once and trying again. ASF now automatically does that before sending a trade. Please note that it has nothing to do with valid (available/possible) trades being in "ready to accept" or "awaiting confirmation" state.

[4] Newer compiler might generate better code than the old one, leading to small performance/memory benefits.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.3.7
body:
Changes since **[V2.2.3.2](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.3.2)**:
- ASF will now wait extra 60 seconds for user Steam client session if it was disconnected in "playing blocked" state, before starting idling (this is still somehow "experimental", ref: #486).
- ASF will now automatically disable QuickEdit console mode (ref: #489).
- Windows OS sleep prevention introduced in the previous release will now only trigger with ASF in `Headless` mode.
- Added support for ```*``` query in ```!owns``` command (ref: #488).
- Non-sticky `!pause` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** was renamed to `!pause~`, and sticky `!pause^` is now default `!pause` used by ASF.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V2.2.3.2](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.3.2)**:
- ASF will now wait extra 60 seconds for user Steam client session if it was disconnected in "playing blocked" state, before starting idling (ref: #486).
- Added support for ```*``` query in ```!owns``` command (ref: #488)
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.3.2
body:
Changes since **[V2.2.2.4](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.2.4)**:
- [!] ASF is now smart enough to automatically choose proper appID for "Series" (video) apps with trading cards in them. Previously it'd be stuck farming wrong game (ref: #473).
- From now on running ASF will prevent Windows OS from going to sleep (ref: #457) [1].
- Added extra logic for handling locked/disabled accounts (ref: #469).
- Added `KeepMissingGames` to `RedeemingPreferences` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)** (ref: #470).
- Added back metadata publishing to all WCF bindings (ref: #448).
- Added `!input` **[command](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** (ref: #476).
- `DismissInventoryNotifications` is now `false` by default.
- `AcceptDonations` can now be used together with `DontAcceptBotTrades` in `TradingPreferences`.
- Fixed ASF crash on invalid `IdentitySecret`/`SharedSecret` in ASF 2FA.
- Fixed `SendTradePeriod` not working properly.
- Fixed NLog issue that could lead to ASF crash when run via Mono in systemd environment without custom `NLog.config` (ref: #292).
- Fixed WCF refusing to handle too large `!api` responses.
- Updated **[statistics and privacy policy](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Statistics#current-privacy-policy)** (ref: #450) [2].
- Updated internal SteamKit2 code, this results in some misc changes of `!redeem` statuses. I took the opportunity and **[documented them in the FAQ](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/FAQ)** while I was at it.
- Further unified ASF commands by adding bot identifier to all of them (ref: #468).
- Removed `AcceptConfirmationsPeriod` [3].
- Removed default entries in `Blacklist`  **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**, since they're defined in hardcoded ASF `GlobalBlacklist` already.
- ASF will no longer accept `SteamTradeMatcher` trades without `MatchEverything`, if we can't fetch our inventory during parsing the trade.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1] ASF is a service (daemon). When user launches the program then he desires that it'll keep running also when he's away from PC. If that is not desired, you can close ASF when you expect OS to go to sleep, use `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished`, or any third-party tool which would close ASF whenever you want. The improvement introduced with this change will give a hint to Windows OS (yes, not working on Mono, sorry) that we wish to stay active and prevent OS from going to sleep while the program is running - this is  built-in and active automatically when ASF is running (regardless if as a service, or not).

[2] ASF will now skip reporting accounts with non-public/empty inventories, as well as include in the request number of cards you have. When a version with this change goes stable, public ASF STM listing will no longer accept requests from outdated clients that are missing this info. The objective of this change is to purge bots with empty inventories from listing, as well as sorting them according to number of items in inventory.

[3] This property was added when ASF 2FA existed in solo + import mode, and the purpose was automatic accept of confirmations in solo mode. Due to the fact that ASF 2FA exists only in import mode since quite a while, and user should be using authenticator of his choice for all 2FA-related tasks, this property is no longer inside ASF 2FA scope, and should be removed to avoid confusion. Yet another reason for this is the fact that it actually didn't work **at all** since **almost 5 months** and nobody even found out.

From non-ASF things it's also worth mentioning that AppVeyor will now automatically deploy all ASF releases on GitHub, simplyfing the work I usually have to do. Stable releases will be manually promoted from pre-releases when the time is right (as usual). I also cut the Crowdin spam in the commits (ref: #431).

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

 [![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.3.1
body:
**NOTICE:** This is stable release candidate.

- Updated internal SteamKit2 code, this results in some misc changes of `!redeem` statuses. I took the opportunity and **[documented them in the FAQ](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/FAQ)** while I was at it.
- Further unified ASF commands by adding bot identifier to all of them (ref: #468).
- Removed `AcceptConfirmationsPeriod` [3].
- Removed default entries in `Blacklist`  **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**, since they're defined in hardcoded ASF `GlobalBlacklist` already.
- ASF will no longer accept `SteamTradeMatcher` trades without `MatchEverything`, if we can't fetch our inventory during parsing the trade.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

[2] ASF will now skip reporting accounts with non-public/empty inventories, as well as include in the request number of cards you have. When a version with this change goes stable, public ASF STM listing will no longer accept requests from outdated clients that are missing this info. The objective of this change is to purge bots with empty inventories from listing, as well as sorting them according to number of items in inventory.

[3] This property was added when ASF 2FA existed in solo + import mode, and the purpose was automatic accept of confirmations in solo mode. Due to the fact that ASF 2FA exists only in import mode since quite a while, and user should be using authenticator of his choice for all 2FA-related tasks, this property is no longer inside ASF 2FA scope, and should be removed to avoid confusion. Yet another reason for this is the fact that it actually didn't work **at all** since **almost 5 months** and nobody even found out.

Stable releases will be manually promoted from pre-releases when the time is right (as usual). I also cut the Crowdin spam in the commits (ref: #431).

[1] ASF is a service (daemon), when user launches the program then he desires that it'll keep running also when he's away from PC. If that is not desired, you can close ASF when you expect OS to go to sleep, use `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished`, or any third-party tool which would close ASF whenever you want.

[2] ASF will now skip reporting accounts with non-public/empty inventories, as well as include in the request number of cards you have. When a version with this change goes stable, public ASF STM listing will no longer accept requests from outdated clients that are missing this info.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.2.6
body:
**NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---

Changes since **[V2.2.2.4](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.2.4)**:
- From now on running ASF will prevent Windows OS from going to sleep [1].
- Added back metadata publishing to all WCF bindings.
- `DismissInventoryNotifications` is now `false` by default.
- Fixed ASF crash on invalid `IdentitySecret`/`SharedSecret` in ASF 2FA.
- Updated **[statistics and privacy policy](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Statistics#current-privacy-policy)** [2].
- Updated internal SteamKit2 code, this results in some misc changes of `!redeem` statuses. I took the opportunity and **[documented them in the FAQ](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/FAQ)** while I was at it.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.
- [Non-ASF] AppVeyor will now automatically deploy all ASF releases on GitHub, simplyfing the work I usually have to do. Stable releases will be manually promoted from pre-releases when the time is right (as usual).

---

[1] ASF is a service (daemon), when user launches the program then he desires that it'll keep running also when he's away from PC. If that is not desired, you can close ASF when you expect OS to go to sleep, use `ShutdownOnFarmingFinished`, or any third-party tool which would close ASF whenever you want.

[2] ASF will now skip reporting accounts with non-public/empty inventories, as well as include in the request number of cards you have. When a version with this change goes stable, public ASF STM listing will no longer accept requests from outdated clients that are missing this info.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.2.4
body:
Changes since **[V2.2.2.1](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.2.1)**:
- Added back overall ASF status to `!status ASF` (it was accidentally removed during rewrite).
- Added support for `bot1..bot9` syntax when using multiple-target **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Added `!oa` and `!sa` **[command aliases](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- `ASF` keyword in multiple-target **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)** is now case-insensitive.
- Added `WCFBinding` **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added `DontAcceptBotTrades` option to `TradingPreferences` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- Changed default value of `TradingPreferences` from `AcceptDonations` to `None`.
- Fixed possible ASF exit/crash on invalid Steam network responses.
- Fixed too early ASF crash by postponing services init until runtime check.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.2.1
body:
Changes since **[V2.2.1.6](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.1.6)**:
- [!] Fixed network instability introduced in ASF V2.2.1.2. Coincidentally, this has nothing to do with network enhancements that arrived in V2.2.1.6. Huge thanks to **[Budgie](http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198053745959/)** and other folks helping me with their debug logs.
- Added `OptimizationMode` **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)**.
- Added multiple bot targets for **[commands](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Commands)**.
- Unified the format of ASF responses for easier strings manipulation. All responses should start with a newline now.
- Added **[SteamTarget](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Logging#steamtarget)** NLog logging target, available with custom logging configs.
- Removed `!*all` commands, such as: `!lootall`, `!statusall`, `!startall` and `!ownsall`. Use newly-introduced multiple bot targets, such as `!status ASF` for previous `!statusall`.
- Fixed writing debug log for multiple bots at once.
- Misc code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.1.6
body:
Build rolled back from stable due to networking issues people are observing.

---

Changes since **[V2.2.0.5](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.0.5)**:
- [!] Added localization support for ASF [1].
- [!] Reworked ASF heartbeats [2].
- [!] ASF is now smart enough to automatically skip farming games that weren't released yet.
- Added `CurrentCulture` **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** for overriding default language.
- Added unused keys response to `!redeem`.
- Removed `SteamApiKey`, API key is now automatically fetched by ASF during runtime. Big thanks to @il-marc for initial implementation!
- Renamed `HttpTimeout` to `ConnectionTimeout`. New property is also responsible for several other types of timeouts, such as Steam network and heartbeats.
- Fixed potential exploit allowing attacker to trigger ASF error message.
- Fixed `!addlicense` and other store-based functionality not working properly for accounts restricted with `SteamParentalPIN`.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1] Translations are still work-in-progress and their quality will improve over time. If you want to help, be it because ASF is not available in your language yet, or because you spotted some incorrect/bad translation, please visit **[localization](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Localization)** and contribute! 👍 

[2] In the past ASF was very "liberal" towards networking issues, it was forgiving even for most awful timeouts and invalid responses, which could lead to a situation such as Bot (its Steam client) being completely unresponsive due to networking, with no way to bring it back up to operative state without entire ASF restart. This was especially painful for server usages of ASF, as ASF had no real defense against this, which directly affected main ASF aspect - its reliability.

Starting with this release, ASF is much less forgiving for such issues, which will lead to fixed ASF patience when it comes to unresponsive Steam client, or Steam network. In short, if ASF didn't get any packet from Steam network in last minute, ASF will send a request to Steam network requesting it to respond. This will be attemted several number of times (6 with default `ConnectionTimeout`), then if no response arrives, ASF will assume that Steam client/network is down, and attempt a reconnect. If no packet arrived for reconnect attempt in given timeout (2 minutes with default `ConnectionTimeout`) either, entire Steam client is abandoned and re-created in order to fight with the situation described above. This considers only a situation of networking being alive, but in "corrupted" state - if your OS reports no network/connection being lost, ASF is still aware of this and as long as Steam client is operative (e.g. attempts to reconnect), no action will be taken.

What it means to you? It means that depending on both your network, and Steam network stability, you might see increased number of failed HeartBeats, reconnect attemps and ASF abandoning Steam client instances. This does not mean that the issue suddenly arrived with this ASF version - because it was here for the entire time, older ASF simply ignored it to some degree and patiently waited for situation to fix itself, which very often didn't fix itself, rendering ASF bot unusable. You can control ASF patience to some degree with `ConnectionTimeout`, as described in Configuration section on the wiki, and most likely you will need to do so if your network is extremely unstable. Overall this change should improve ASF reliability and responsiveness greatly, even if for the cost of increased number of reconnect attempts and being less forgiving towards networking issues.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and its problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.1.5
body:
**NOTICE:** This is stable release candidate, assuming I won't find any more bugs.

---

Changes since **[V2.2.0.5](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/tag/2.2.0.5)**:
- [!] Added localization support for ASF [1].
- [!] ASF is now smart enough to automatically skip farming games that weren't released yet.
- [!] Renamed `HttpTimeout` to `ConnectionTimeout`. New property is also responsible for several other types of timeouts, such as Steam network and heartbeats.
- Added `CurrentCulture` **[global config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** for overriding default language.
- Added unused keys response to `!redeem`.
- Removed `SteamApiKey`, API key is now automatically fetched by ASF during runtime. Big thanks to @il-marc for initial implementation!
- Fixed potential exploit allowing attacker to trigger ASF error message.
- Fixed `!addlicense` and other store-based functionality not working properly for accounts restricted with `SteamParentalPIN`.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

[1] Translations are still work-in-progress and their quality will improve over time. If you want to help, be it because ASF is not available in your language yet, or because you spotted some incorrect/bad translation, please visit **[localization](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Localization)** and contribute! 👍 

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.0.5
body:
- [!] Removed `ForwardKeysToOtherBots` and `DistributeKeys` - it's unified under new `RedeemingPreferences` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- [!] Added new `LootableTypes` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- [!] `IsBotAccount` no longer controls looting foil cards, the responsibility now lies in newly introduced `LootableTypes`.
- Added rough approximation of expected farming time, to `!status` and alike (also **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**).
- Fixed statistics reporting not working on older versions of Mono.
- Fixed rare issue that could lead to ASF not connecting to Steam Network.
- Fixed ASF not parsing command-line arguments when running as a service.
- Removed `ForceHttp` global config property. For reasoning, see **[commit](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/cc317e10a8f1c71a16b0c577ddb0976adc244d71)**.
- Usual code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

- [!] Added new `LootableTypes` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- [!] `IsBotAccount` no longer controls looting foil cards, the responsibility now lies in newly introduced `LootableTypes`.
- Added rough approximation of expected farming time, to `!status` and alike (also **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**).
- Fixed statistics reporting not working on older versions of Mono.
- Fixed rare issue that could lead to ASF not connecting to Steam Network.
- Fixed ASF not parsing command-line arguments when running as a service.
- Removed `ForceHttp` global config property. For reasoning, see **[commit](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/cc317e10a8f1c71a16b0c577ddb0976adc244d71)**.
- Usual code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.2.0.3
body:
**NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---
- [!] Removed `ForwardKeysToOtherBots` and `DistributeKeys` - it's unified under new `RedeemingPreferences` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- [!] Added new `LootableTypes` **[bot config property](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#bot-config)**.
- [!] `IsBotAccount` no longer controls looting foil cards, the responsibility now lies in newly introduced `LootableTypes`.
- Added experimental feature of auto-queue discovery and SteamAwards voting [1].
- Added rough approximation of expected farming time, to `!status` and alike (also **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**).
- Fixed statistics reporting not working on older versions of Mono.
- Fixed rare issue that could lead to ASF not connecting to Steam Network.
- Fixed ASF not parsing command-line arguments when running as a service.
- Removed `ForceHttp` global config property. For reasoning, see **[commit](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/commit/cc317e10a8f1c71a16b0c577ddb0976adc244d71)**.
- Usual code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

[1] I said many times that this is out of the scope of ASF, and somehow I still believe that it's so, but I also got many people asking for this for a long time, and once Steam sale finally started, I had enough of data to test and implement this.

ASF will automatically check each 6 hours if account should vote and/or explore discovery queue. If yes - ASF will do that for extra 3 sale cards each day. There is lots of debugging that helps me to check if everything is working like it should, I left it intentionally for you so you could see if it's working.

**I do not plan to release any stable release with this in near future**. This is **nowhere close** to be called stable, and I won't offer any support for this, neither accept any bugs-reporting. If it works for you, that's great, if not, sorry - out of the scope. This feature will automatically disappear 2nd January 18:00 UTC (Sale ending), and then **maybe** I will call at least queue discovery stable enough to land in stable ASF release next sale.

If this addition works for you and you're enjoying it, don't forget to donate. I spent a while doing this, and put it in ASF for free, even though I could keep it for myself or sell to people that offered me much more than I'm usually making from ASF donations as a whole. ASF is and will always be available **for free**, but my willings to code features out of the scope of the program are pretty limited and usually depend on donations and positive feedback - you didn't disappoint me so far, and I appreciate it, that's why you get this feature in for no cost, out of my free will 😃 .

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Even 1$ is highly appreciated and shows that you care!

[![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.1.7.9
body:
- [!] Enhanced **[Statistics](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Statistics)** by new features. Please review changes to our privacy policy.
- There is now public ASF-STM listing located **[here](https://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**. You can read more about it in link above.
- `WCFHostname` has been renamed to `WCFHost`. Please review **[Configuration](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** as default value was also changed to `"127.0.0.1"`.
- ASF will now accept trade offers also from `SteamOwnerID`.
- ASF will now reject group invites when `IsBotAccount`.
- Added `IsLimitedUser` info to both `!status` and **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**.
- Added Steam Winter Sale 2016 to global and local blacklist.
- Fixed offline messages from family sharing users being ignored when in `FarmOffline` mode.
- Fixed making it impossible for family sharing users to play when `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` is being used.
- Fixed `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` with `Paused` CardsFarmer.
- Fixed very rare issue of ASF not detecting some games available for farming due to Steam fuckup.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.
- [2.1.7.7] Fixed cross-OS WCF incompatibility between Mono and Windows
- [2.1.7.7] Corrected `WCFHost` in ConfigGenerator
- [2.1.7.8] Fixed issue that could lead to increased network instability in very rare case
- [2.1.7.9] Switched `Statistics` STM listing to new protocol version (old one won't work anymore)

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Your donations directly influence our willings to work on the project - even smallest amount is highly appreciated!

[![Paypal.me Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal.me-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.me/JustArchi/1usd) [![Paypal Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paypal-donate-yellow.svg)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HD2P2P3WGS5Y4) [![Bitcoin Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitcoin-donate-yellow.svg)](https://blockchain.info/address/1Archi6M1r5b41Rvn1SY2FfJAzsrEUT7aT) [![Steam Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-donate-yellow.svg)](https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=46697991&token=0ix2Ruv_)

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.1.7.7
body:
- [!] Enhanced **[Statistics](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Statistics)** by new features. Please review changes to our privacy policy.
- There is now public ASF-STM listing located **[here](https://asf.justarchi.net/STM)**. You can read more about it in link above.
- `WCFHostname` has been renamed to `WCFHost`. Please review **[Configuration](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Configuration#global-config)** as default value was also changed to `"127.0.0.1"`.
- ASF will now accept trade offers also from `SteamOwnerID`.
- ASF will now reject group invites when `IsBotAccount`.
- Added `IsLimitedUser` info to both `!status` and **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**.
- Added Steam Winter Sale 2016 to global and local blacklist.
- Fixed offline messages from family sharing users being ignored when in `FarmOffline` mode.
- Fixed making it impossible for family sharing users to play when `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` is being used.
- Fixed `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` with `Paused` CardsFarmer.
- Fixed very rare issue of ASF not detecting some games available for farming due to Steam fuckup.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.
- [2.1.7.7] Fixed cross-OS WCF incompatibility between Mono and Windows
- [2.1.7.7] Corrected `WCFHost` in ConfigGenerator

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Your donations directly influence our willings to work on the project - even smallest amount is highly appreciated!

name: ArchiSteamFarm V2.1.7.5
body:
**NOTICE:** Pre-releases are experimental versions that often contain unpatched bugs, work-in-progress features or rewritten implementations. If you don't consider yourself advanced user, please download **[latest stable release](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/releases/latest)** instead. Pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given. Check out ASF **[release cycle](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Release-cycle)** if you'd like to learn more.

---
- [!] Enhanced **[Statistics](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/Statistics)** by new features. Please review changes to our privacy policy.

- ASF will now reject group invites when `IsBotAccount`.
- Added `IsLimitedUser` info to both `!status` and **[API](https://github.com/JustArchi/ArchiSteamFarm/wiki/API)**.
- Fixed offline messages from family sharing users being ignored when in `FarmOffline` mode.
- Fixed making it impossible for family sharing users to play when `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` is being used.
- Fixed `GamesPlayedWhileIdle` with `Paused` CardsFarmer.
- Hopefully fixed very rare issue of ASF not detecting some games available for farming due to Steam fuckup.
- Major code improvements, optimizations and bugfixes.

---

ASF is available for free. If you're grateful for what we're doing, please consider donating. Developing ASF requires massive amount of time and knowledge, especially when it comes to Steam (and it's problems). Even smallest amount is highly appreciated!
